TIP_MESSAGES: You can use the word 'All' for the enchantment name.
You can use the enchantment name or ID.
You can enchant a book to get an enchanted book.
ERROR_NO_ITEM: You must be holding an item.
ERROR_NO_LEVEL: You must specify an enchantment level.
ERROR_NO_PERMISSION: You do not have permission to do this.
ERROR_NO_PERMISSION_LEVEL: You don't have permission to use enchantment levels past {LEVEL}.
ERROR_INVALID_LEVEL: Could not parse specified enchantment level.
